articles.content: Google Chrome will gradually undergo a fundamental revision, and it will deeply impact all extensions for the web browser. The upcoming revised set of Application Programming Interfaces (APIs), colle… [+2466 chars]

articles.title: The T-Mobile TVision Hub offers 4K streaming and an ethernet port - The Verge
articles.description: T-Mobile’s TVision Hub offers Google TV and Chromecast, as well as a voice-controlled remote control. The dongle also includes an ethernet port for a direct home internet connection.
articles.content:

articles.title: Update Chrome now, because hackers are attacking it - PCWorld
articles.description: Google has released version 96.0.4664.110 of its Chrome desktop browser to address a security vulnerability that is being exploited. Update Chrome ASAP to protect your PC.
